results.title: In just 4 months, AI medical scribe Abridge doubles valuation to $5.3B
results.content: Abridge, an AI startup automating medical notes, has secured a $300 million Series E at a $5.3 billion valuation, according to the Wall Street Journal.

results.title: Abridge Raises $300M Series E at $5.3B Valuation | The SaaS News
results.content: # Abridge Raises $300M Series E at $5.3B Valuation Abridge, a Pittsburgh, PA-based AI-powered healthcare company, has secured $300 million in Series E funding at a $5.3 billion valuation. The round was led by Andreessen Horowitz, with participation from Khosla Ventures. Andreessen Horowitz is a venture capital firm focused on investing in and supporting technology-driven companies. **Abridge Use of Funds** The company will use the funds to support its expansion into AI-powered medical coding, in addition to scaling its core medical scribe technology. **About Abridge** Abridge is uses generative AI to automate clinical documentation. Abridge's mission is to power deeper understanding in healthcare through purpose-built AI. Company: Abridge AI, Inc. Additional Investors: Khosla Ventures  Source: https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/24/in-just-4-months-ai-medical-scribe-abridge-doubles-valuation-to-5-3b/

Abridge Raises $300M Series E at $5.3B Valuation | The SaaS News
# Abridge Raises $300M Series E at $5.3B Valuation Abridge, a Pittsburgh, PA-based AI-powered healthcare company, has secured $300 million in Series E funding at a $5.3 billion valuation. The round was led by Andreessen Horowitz, with participation from Khosla Ventures. Andreessen Horowitz is a venture capital firm focused on investing in and supporting technology-driven companies. **Abridge Use of Funds** The company will use the funds to support its expansion into AI-powered medical coding, in addition to scaling its core medical scribe technology. **About Abridge** Abridge is uses generative AI to automate clinical documentation. Abridge's mission is to power deeper understanding in healthcare through purpose-built AI. Company: Abridge AI, Inc. Additional Investors: Khosla Ventures  Source: https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/24/in-just-4-months-ai-medical-scribe-abridge-doubles-valuation-to-5-3b/
